topic.title: How to Use Virginia Tech's WiFi as a Guest
topic.shortdesc: Are you trying to use the WiFi, but are having difficulties connecting? Watch our video or read our directions to surf the web in no time!

li.p: Go to your Network Settings and select the Virginia Tech wireless network.open your preferred web browser. The Welcome to Virginia Tech landing page should open automatically in your browser.
Follow the prompts and put in the required information.
Enter the SMS text message code you receive.
Check to ensure that the WiFi is working.
